summary: A specialized trainer that builds on the HuggingFace Transformers Trainer to manage the full training, evaluation, and inference lifecycle of SentenceTransformer models, handling model initialization, loss setup, dataset preparation, optimizer and scheduler configuration, and seamless integration with logging, monitoring, and carbon‑tracking callbacks.
business_intent: Provide developers with an out‑of‑the‑box, configurable solution for efficiently training and fine‑tuning sentence embedding models, while automatically capturing performance metrics, generating model documentation, and supporting sustainable training practices.
